name: The Able Space Program
description:
The able Space Program sees you leap into the unknown as you take control of Able a chimp who caries on the noble tradition of primates in space.  You must help able by navigating the rocket ship through the dangerous expanse of the cosmos dodging asteroids and trying to set a new distance record. It's time to go where no chimp has gone before! 

How to play

Tap space as fast as you can for 5 seconds, this will provide you with a speed boost to launch you forward

you can press the arrow keys to turn and avoid dangerous asteroids that will slow you down if you hit them, or alternatively  navigate into speed boost power ups
